g2:c.PROCEDURE.g2:a.TEXT:
release-inspect-callback (S: symbol, Tot: integer, Exed: integer, Matches: integer, Seq: sequence, UData: class parameter)
begin
if Exed = Tot then conclude that UData = Matches else conclude that UData = -1;
end
permit-system-call-grammar() begin system call extend-procedure-grammar(); end

g2:Structure.g2:sa.STEPDESC: Save GFR, GXL, GMS & SYS-MOD to Source (CVS)
Save GFR, GXL, GMS & SYS-MOD to DEV

g2:c.FREE-TEXT.g2:a.TEXT: Promote DEMOS, GXL, GMS, GFR & SYS-MOD to kbs and tests
Pause G2. Text strip the KB
Save demos, gxl, gms, gfr to SOURCE (CVS)

g2:c.TEXT-INSERTER.g2:a.TEXT: recompile every procedure assigned to module gxl or assigned to module gms or assigned to module gfr

g2:Structure.g2:sa.ASSOCIATED-TEXT: this must be done because gfr-palette-window is not stable and making _gfr-palette-window stable screws up the palette upgrade because it makes merging _gfr-palette-windows using the change slot impossible

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: Fix _gfr-palette-window
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: in order change the text of the item-configuration of _gfr-palette-window to "none" and make _gfr-palette-window permanent

g2:c.TEXT-INSERTER.g2:a.TEXT: show on a workspace every kb-workspace W such that (the name of W does not exist and the item superior to W does not exist)

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: Set Version Information
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: start grm-set-version-information (the grm-util-pkg-name of release-build-data, the grm-long-version of release-build-data, quantity (the grm-current-build of release-build-data), quantity (the grm-oldest-build of release-build-data), the grm-min-g2-version of release-build-data, the grm-copyright of release-build-data, "[the current real time as a time stamp]", "")

g2:c.FREE-TEXT.g2:a.TEXT: Hide attribute displays and name boxes. Go to the subworkspace of the copyright symbols on gfr-top-level and gxl-top-level and use the menu choice hide-all-names-and-attribute-displays-in-hierarchy@!
Save demos, gxl, gms, gfr & sysmod to DISTRIBUTION directory
Save demos, gxl, gms, gfr & sysmod to DEVELOPMENT directory

g2:c.TEXT-INSERTER.g2:a.TEXT: show on a workspace every module-information with notes

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: Save Gfr, Gms & Gxl modules to SOURCE (CVS)
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: start grm-save-modules (the symbol SRC, the symbol ALLMODS, false, "", this window)

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: Save Sysmod, Gfr, Gms & Gxl modules to DEV
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: in order start grm-save-modules (the symbol DEV, the symbol ALLMODS, false, "", this window) and show gxldemo at the center of the screen and show gmsdemo-top-level at the center of the screen

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: Save Sysmod, Gfr, Gms & Gxl modules to DIST
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: start grm-save-modules (the symbol DIST, the symbol NODEMOS, false, "", this window)

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: Set Title Blocks
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: start grm-set-title-blocks-info (the grm-util-pkg-name of release-build-data, the grm-long-version of release-build-data, the grm-copyright of release-build-data, this window)

g2:c.TEXT-INSERTER.g2:a.TEXT: display a table of the table-header, notes, names, gfr-module-name, gfr-package-name, gfr-version-description, gfr-minimum-g2-version, gfr-version-number, and gfr-oldest-compatible-version of every gfr-version-information-object

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: Save Demo modules to DIST
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: start grm-save-modules (the symbol DIST, the symbol ONLYDEMOS, false, "", this window)

g2:c.FREE-TEXT.g2:a.TEXT: For sys-mod: 1. Hide the workspace named g2-system-procedures. 2. Delete the workspace containing the sys-mod build instructions.

For sys-mod: 1. Update the version on the System Procedures workspace. 2. Make sure text-strip markers have been added to each new procedure. 3. Make sure that an argument signature is created for each new procedure. 4. Make sure that the procedure g2-get-sys-mod-version is updated based on the current G2 version information.

g2:Structure.g2:sa.STEPDESC: Save GFR, GXL, GMS & SYS-MOD to DIST

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: Resume Automated Promote From Failed Step
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: in order conclude that grm-promote-in-progress is true and start grm-resume-automated-promote-from-failed-step (this workspace, this window)

g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.LABEL: Run Automated Promote
g2:c.ACTION-BUTTON.g2:a.ACTION: in order conclude that grm-promote-in-progress is true and start grm-run-automated-promote (true, this workspace, this window)

g2:c.FREE-TEXT.g2:a.TEXT: Set grm-build-data-path & save grm.kb before starting the automated promote process
